Supreme Industries Ltd.'s share price rose by 0.77% from its previous close, with the last traded price at Rs 4,576.40.

An acquisition and licensing agreement, effective August 1, 2025, was set to enhance the Plastic Piping Division's capacities, market reach, and product range.

Expansions in capacity for the Plastic Piping business and Protective packaging products were progressing at various locations.

A new unit for material handling products was planned in Gwalior to expand the company's presence in central India.

Trial production was underway for the PP silent pipe system, a result of collaboration with M/s. Poloplast Gmbh of Austria, with commercial production expected to begin the following month.

The company had completed its initial order for polyethylene pipe for gas use and received DVGW Certification from Germany for Electrofusion (EF) Fittings used in water and gas applications.
